name: legion
author: Valkyrie Legion Team
description: Legion - A build system for Valkyrie projects

scripts.build: node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile main.vk && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/workspace.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/compiler.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/filesystem.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/builder.valkyrie
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('build')) { fs.rmSync('build', {recursive: true}); console.log('Build directory cleaned'); } else { console.log('No build directory to clean'); }"
scripts.compile:main: node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile main.vk && mkdir -p build && mv main.js build/
scripts.compile:library: node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/workspace.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/compiler.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/filesystem.valkyrie && node ../valkyrie-bootstrap/bootstrap.js compile library/builder.valkyrie && mkdir -p build/library && mv library/*.js build/library/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run legion:build
